condition.narrative: 4.01 The Co-financing Deadline for the effectiveness of the Co-financing Agreement is December 31, 2019.

Schedule 2, Section I.A.5 Establish not later than three (3) months from the Effectiveness Date and thereafter maintain, at alltimes during the implementation of the Project, a Project Oversight Committee (POC) with a mandate, composition and resourcessatisfactory to the Association.

Schedule 2, Section I.A.6 Establish not later than three (3) months from the Effectiveness Date and thereafter maintain, at alltimes during the implementation of the Project, a Technical Committee comprising of the directors of the RDCU and the SocialProtection Directorate, chaired by the Chief Directors of MLGRD and MoGCSP and responsible for providing technical guidance on theProject.
